description:
One-Click File Sharing for your network.
Obmin is lightweight HTTP(S) File Server for GNU/Linux systems.

Features:
⚫ Easy installation.
⚫ Easy setup just choose file(s) locations and tune Obmin on.
⚫ Doesn't require ROOT privileges.
⚫ Doesn't require any special client side installation.
⚫ HTTP transfer protocol available everywhere Linux, OSX, Windows, Android, iOS so.
⚫ More ...

For more information and how-to see README.md
name: Obmin
